name: Escaping Slime
description:
RANKED #1 IN IZTECH HYPEJAM

Escaping Slime is a puzzle-runner game made for IZTECH HyperJam22 in 36 hours.

Escaping slime never stops moving!

You are supposed to solve the puzzles by rotating platforms for your slime to reach checkpoints. 

Controls: 

Mouse or tap only to rotate.
